title: The Menu for 2025-01-04
text:
Figure 1: Your expectations of this meal.


Disclaimer: Items on the menu are subject to change.

The Carbs
Turkish bread with olive oil & assorted herbs.
Creamy mashed potato.
Crispy baked potato.


The Greens
Green salad with sesame oil dressing.
Baked vegetables.


The Protein
Lamb shoulder pot roast.


The Wagyu

Hida A5 Sirloin 600g 飛騨牛サーロイン
Kobe A5 Scotch Fillet 300g 神戸牛スコッチフィレ
Furano A5 Sirloin 300g 富良野牛サーロイン
Furano A5 Scotch Fillet 300g　富良野スコッチフィレ
Mayura MBS9+ Sirloin 300g
Eye fillet (or smth idk)








The Dessert
idk 🤷‍♂️


The Drinks
Dassai 23 Junmai Daijingo 獺祭２３純米大吟醸　(approx. 50% remaining)
Bon Tsuya Junmai Daijingo 梵艶純米大吟醸
Other drinks (probably)

DassaiBon

title: Preparation
text:
Shopping List
Butcher:

2kg Lamb Shoulder (bone-in cut into chunks)

Supermarket:

4kg Potatoes
1 bag (1-2kg) Carrot
Roast veggies
Cherry Tomatoes
4 leaf salad
1-2 slabs of Turkish bread
Garlic & Onion infused oil
1L Chicken Stock
Tomato paste (~3 tbsp)
Sasame dressing (?)
Walnuts (optional)

Herbs:

Cumin
Fennel
Thyme
Bay leaf
Parsley
Rosemary (fresh?)

Assuming there is already:

Corn starch
Olive oil
Neutral oil
Salt & Pepper
